name: Within: Legend of the Elves Full version
name_original: Within: Legend of the Elves Full version
description:
The Full version of Within: Legend of the Elves.

20 years ago the humans and elves were at war and the humans launched a stone known today as the Dark Stone. The Blast devastated the Elven lands and unbeknownst to the humans released magical energy that led to the creation of dark elves.

Follow the short story of a group of Elves led by Jabar as they try to make it to the human border  to warn the humans of the impending doom of the dark stone.
